title: iDigital
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Mayo Clinic’s secret weapon against AI hallucinations: Reverse RAG in action
items.description: To tackle data-retrieval-based hallucinations in non-diagnostic use cases, Mayo Clinic has applied CURE reverse RAG paired with vector databases.

items.title: My husband plans to leave his entire estate to his adult son, who steals his credit card to gamble online. What can I do?
items.description: “Dementia runs in my husband’s family. My husband’s son has been known to take money from his dad without permission.”

items.title: How Yelp reviewed competing LLMs for correctness, relevance and tone to develop its user-friendly AI assistant
